data.text: @ShannonJoyRadio @WXXINews @ShannonJoyRadio what the hell is this bs? At what point did you become a conspiracy theorist? I've never once heard you say anything that could be considered that with the liberalest of takes. They're just branding you and trying to discredit you. Journalistic integrity is dead. https://t.co/Efrp70fjAC

@ShannonJoyRadio @WXXINews I don't see why they have a problem with you telling truth about worthless vaccine mandates and garbage masks! "Conspiracy theories"!! These people will be on the wrong side of history

@ShannonJoyRadio @WXXINews That’s what I meant. My brain is tired. I’m glad you filed. Those charges were bogus to begin with. They were trying to make an example out of you to scare others and messed with the wrong woman.

@ShannonJoyRadio @WXXINews Wow. That link was taking me to a blank page so I found the one below. I didn’t realize they dropped that lawsuit. They had no justification for doing that to you. I’m glad you’re fighting back. 💪

https://t.co/TPykdPUzhY
